messages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.
'response' is assigned a value but never used. Allowed unused vars must match /^[A-Z_]/u.
'useState' is defined but never used. Allowed unused vars must match /^[A-Z_]/u.

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ADMIN_DATA } from '../../../data/adminData'; import { UserPlus, Filter, Download, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const AdmissionsConsole = () => { const { admissions, overview } = ADMIN_DATA; return (
{/* Pipeline Summary */}

Inquiries

{overview.pipeline.inquiries}

Verified Applications

{overview.pipeline.verified}

Enrolled This Month

{overview.pipeline.enrolled}

{/* Main Console */}

Application Tracker

{admissions.map(app => ( ))}
Applicant ID Name Grade Date Stage Action
APP-{app.id} {app.name} Grade {app.grade} {app.date} {app.stage}
); }; export default AdmissionsConsole;

messages.message: React Hook useCallback has a missing dependency: 'LEGACY_ROLE_MAP'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [LEGACY_ROLE_MAP, dispatch]

{title}

{value}

{subtext}

); const LibraryDashboard = () => { const { stats, catalog } = LIBRARIAN_DATA; return (
{/* 1. Stats Overview */}
{/* 2. Catalog Management */}

Library Catalog

{catalog.map((book) => ( ))}
Book Details Category ISBN Stock Actions

{book.title}

{book.author}

 {book.category} {book.isbn}
{book.available} / {book.stock}
); }; export default LibraryDashboard;

import React from 'react'; import { MANAGEMENT_DATA } from '../../../data/managementData'; import { Users, GraduationCap, Calendar, DollarSign, TrendingUp, AlertTriangle } from 'lucide-react'; const KPICard = ({ title, value, subtext, icon: Icon, color, trend }) => (

{title}

{value}

{trend} {subtext}
); const InstitutionalOverview = () => { const { overview } = MANAGEMENT_DATA; return (
{/* 1. High-Level KPIs */}
{/* 2. Real-Time Alerts */}

Executive Alerts

{overview.alerts.map((alert, i) => (

{alert.type === 'critical' ? 'Critical Action Required' : 'Attention Needed'}

{alert.msg}

))} {/* Safe state example */}

Operationally Stable

Transport and Canteen modules running within budget.

{/* 3. Quick Faculty Stats */}

Human Capital

Faculty Strength {overview.facultyStrength}
Retention Rate {overview.retentionRate}%
); }; export default InstitutionalOverview;

messages.message:
Error: Cannot call impure function during render

`Math.random` is an impure function. Calling an impure function can produce unstable results that update unpredictably when the component happens to re-render. (https://react.dev/reference/rules/components-and-hooks-must-be-pure#components-and-hooks-must-be-idempotent).

   6 |   const days = React.useMemo(() => Array.from({ length: 30 }, (_, i) => ({
   7 |     day: i + 1,
>  8 |     status: Math.random() > 0.1 ? 'present' : (Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'absent' : 'holiday')
     |             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Cannot call impure function
   9 |   })), []);
  10 |
  11 |   return (
